backend/main.mo: Defines data types, authorization helpers, and state maps for clients, trainers, workouts, logs, and bookings, including admin and trainer password checks.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping feature IDs to affected files, components, and test IDs for admin UI and login flow updates.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides highâ€‘level summaries for various frontend files describing their roles across login, dashboards, components, and hooks.
frontend/CUSTOM_DOMAIN.md: Documentation explaining how to configure a custom domain for the Internet Computer app via DNS and the ic-domains file.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme variable definitions for light and dark modes using OKLCH color values.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point containing the root div and script loader for the React app.
frontend/public/.well-known/ic-domains: Declares the allowed custom domains for the Internet Computer deployment.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component controlling authentication state, navigation between views, and session persistence for trainer, client, and admin flows.
frontend/src/components/admin/PersonnelT: Admin table component displaying trainer personnel data with columns for first name, last name, and PT code.
frontend/src/components/client/Appointme: Form for clients to request appointments and view confirmed ones, with validation and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/client/AssignedW: Displays a client's assigned workouts, handles loading states, and allows saving workout completions.
frontend/src/components/client/Compilabl: Interactive card for logging completed workout details with validation and save handling.
frontend/src/components/client/WorkoutLo: Lists and sorts a client's workout history, showing completion status and details.
frontend/src/components/client/WorkoutRu: Placeholder component file with no implemented content.
Guided workout runner displaying exercises with navigation and rest timer support.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: React error boundary component rendering a fallback UI with reload support when runtime errors occur.
frontend/src/components/trainer/Bodyweig: Shows bodyweight trends over time with summary stats and a simple visual chart.
frontend/src/components/trainer/BookingU: Dialog component for creating or editing a booking, managing form state, validation, and API mutations.
frontend/src/components/trainer/ClientWo: Displays a list of workouts with exercises and allows optional editing of a selected workout.
frontend/src/components/trainer/Exercise: Shows searchable, grouped exercise performance history with comparisons between first and latest records.
frontend/src/components/trainer/TrainerB: Monthly calendar displaying bookings, allowing day selection and opening dialogs to create or edit bookings.
frontend/src/components/trainer/TrainerC: Tabbed client detail view handling height, weight, exercise progress, and workout management.
frontend/src/components/trainer/WorkoutB: React form component for creating or editing workouts, handling exercises, set weights, rest times, and submission via query hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCountdownTimer.ts: Reusable countdown timer hook supporting start, pause, reset, and tracking completion.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and related UI state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks wrapping backend actor calls for admin, trainer, and client operations.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS base with custom design tokens for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Admin dashboard page showing platform stats and trainer lists using data from query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/AdminLoginPage.tsx: Admin login form with client-side code check and mutation to authenticate the admin.
frontend/src/pages/ClientDashboardPage.t: Client dashboard handling workout logging, assigned workouts, workout runner, and progress management.
frontend/src/pages/ClientLoginPage.tsx: Client login screen validating username and PT code using backend actor authentication.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Trainer dashboard displaying PT code, client list, client details, scheduling, and profile/email updates.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Trainer login page that authenticates via access code and provides navigation to client and admin login flows.
frontend/src/pages/RegistrationPage.tsx: React registration form that validates inputs, calls backend actor methods to register/authenticate a client, and maps errors to user-friendly messages.
frontend/src/utils/bookingTime.ts: Utility helpers for converting, formatting, and computing durations for booking-related Date and time values.
frontend/src/utils/trainerAuthErrors.ts: Parses raw trainer authentication errors and maps them to deterministic, user-friendly English messages.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using both query strings and sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/userFacingErrors.ts: Normalizes backend errors into readable user-facing messages and provides error extraction and logging helpers.
frontend/src/utils/workoutRestTimes.ts: Utilities for validating, normalizing, formatting, and converting per-set rest times in workouts.
frontend/src/utils/workoutSetWeights.ts: Utilities for normalizing, validating, formatting, and converting per-set workout set weights.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, custom colors, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing features, new requests, and configuration for an admin dashboard project.
